name: Advosze
Lore: 'Typical of male Advosze, Bom Vimdin despises those of his own species. Pessimistic and territorial, he is a lone smuggler who prefers to work for corrupt officials.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Whenever you deploy a weapon or device from hand at same location, activate 1 Force as a ''kickback.'' Limit of one Advosze per location.',
